column2: “Samantha?” I can hear Trish approaching. “Um ... hold on!” I hurry to the door, trying to block her view. “It's already five past one,” I can hear her saying a little sharply. “And I did ask, most clearly for ...” Her voice trails off into silence as she reaches the kitchen door, and her whole face sags in astonishment. I turn and follow her gaze as she surveys the endless plates of sandwiches. “My goodness!” At last Trish finds her voice. “This is ... this is very impressive!”
At five past one Alleyn opened the outer door, knocked his pipe out on the edge of the stone step,and remained staring out on to the drive.
